radiographic_examinations.findings: Appendix measures up to 11 mm with mucosal hyperemia and substantial surrounding inflammatory changes as well as small volume free fluid in the right lower quadrant; no organized abscess. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys, stomach, small bowel, colon, rectum, urinary bladder, and reproductive organs are within normal limits. No retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy. No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
